about_the_game:
Welcome to "Asteroid Sentinel," where the fate of the galaxy rests in your hands. Take command of a formidable defense station as you face relentless waves of asteroids and alien spacecraft in this thrilling top-down action game with roguelike elements.

Your mission is clear: annihilate the incoming threats before they breach the safety of our solar system. With precision aiming, unleash a barrage of firepower upon the encroaching danger.

Each enemy vanquished rewards you with valuable experience points, allowing you to unlock a vast array of upgrades for your arsenal. From devastating laser beams to rapid-fire gatling cannons, tailor your loadout to suit your playstyle and overcome even the most formidable adversaries.

The ideal game if you want to spend 15-20 minutes of action-packed fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10750H CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Shoot down masses of asteroids and aliens in this arcade-style shooter with roguelike elements. Level up and upgrade your guns to cope with the endless waves being thrown at you.
